content:
We're looking for an integration specialist with practical NextGen Connect (formerly Mirth) knowledge and skills to design and implement HL7 v2.x, FHIR and custom interfaces. Position will start in a part-time / per assignment basis with the aim to go for a permanent position. Working conditions include flexible time and working in remote (supporting clients and tech team spread across Eastern Europe to New Zealand).

Contact: Koray Atalag (koray@theclinician.com)
